name: Galactic Arena of Mutliation
description:
Choose a robot race and battle others to remain existing in the galaxy. Do this in a pong like area with human targets, score on the enemy opponent after killing humans to harvest the blood split on the battleground. Collect enough blood in the tanks to win against your foe and whip them from existence!

** This game, although playable and beatable, is incomplete. Some of the shop items were not finished and there isn't a full list of achievements. But you can still play it.
